definition: a garment for the upper part of the body: such as
a cloth garment usually having a collar, sleeves, a front opening, and a tail long enough to be tucked inside trousers or a skirt

all or a large part of one's money or resources                                      
             
             lost his shirt on that business deal
a piece of clothing for the upper body that has sleeves and usually a collar and buttons down the front
a piece of clothing for the upper part of the body usually with sleeves and often a collar
in: lost his shirt on that business deal

definition: a piece of clothing that covers the top part of the body. It usually has long sleeves and buttons down the front. A woman’s shirt is often called a blouse.
the part of a sports strip that covers the top part of a player’s body
in: One of his shirt buttons was missing.
a cotton/silk/denim shirt
wearing the number 11 shirt
keep your shirt on
lose your shirt on something
put your shirt on something
someone would give you the shirt off their back

definition: a piece of clothing worn, especially by men, on the upper part of the body, made of light cloth like cotton and usually having a collar and buttons at the front:
a piece of clothing worn on the upper part of the body, made of cloth and often having a collar and buttons at the front:
in: a striped/white shirt
a short-/long-sleeved shirt
You've spilled something down your shirt front.
a short-sleeved/long-sleeved shirt
